data.title: Bike Sharing - Bratislava On Two Wheels
data.meta_description: Try an active relaxation in the city center over the weekend or discover other city districts for a change. Enjoy bike sharing in Bratislava!
data.text:
Enjoy Bratislava without worries on two wheels! The Bike sharing project brings up to 550 bikes to the streets of the capital. Get where they need you quickly and conveniently.

*Please, turn subtitles on

Try an active relaxation in the city center over the weekend or discover other city districts for a change. Yellow bikes can be found at more than a 100 docking stations in 8 city districts including the Old Town (Star√© mesto). With dozens of stations, you can park your bicycle anywhere and borrow it for your next trip.

Thanks to bike sharing you can easily avoid traffic jams and help the environment.
